scripts.dev:setup: npm install && npm run db:down && npm run db:up && npm run backend:build && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.dev:setup:unix: npm install && npm run db:down && npm run db:up && npm run backend:build:unix && concurrently "npm run backend:unix" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.db:down: cd db && docker compose down -v && cd ..
scripts.db:up: cd db && docker compose up -d && cd ..
scripts.db:restart: npm run db:down && npm run db:up
scripts.frontend:dev: cd vite-react-frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.deploy:seed: docker compose up -d --build && timeout /t 15 /nobreak && cd db && bash seed-data.sh
scripts.deploy:seed:unix: docker compose up -d --build && sleep 15 && cd db && bash seed-data.sh
